combo.assistance_dql: select distinct dv_device_family from cd_product_info where a_status='Active' order by 1
select distinct(dv_device_subfamily) from cd_product_info where dv_device_family ='$value(dv_device_family)' and a_status='Active' order by dv_device_subfamily
select distinct dv_device_code from cd_product_info where dv_device_subfamily ='$value(dv_device_subfamily)' and a_status='Active' order by 1
select distinct dv_device_name from cd_product_info where any dv_device_code ='$value(dv_device_code)' and a_status='Active' order by 1

combo.assistance_dictionary: Regulatory Application Forms with Registered Family and Subfamily

combo.assistance_dql: select distinct submission_description from cd_reg_submission_info where application_description='$value(application_descriptions)' and a_status='Active' order by 1
select distinct submission_type from cd_reg_submission_info where submission_description='$value(submission_descriptions)' and a_status='Active' order by 1
select distinct submission_number from cd_reg_submission_info where submission_description='$value(submission_descriptions)' and submission_type='$value(submission_types)' order by 1
